org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc

类 SimpleRpcServerResponder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.ipc.SimpleRpcServerResponder
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Runnable

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
class SimpleRpcServerResponder
extends Thread
    Sends responses of RPC back to clients.

      • processResponse

        private boolean processResponse(SimpleServerRpcConnection conn,
                                RpcResponse resp)
                         throws IOException
        Process the response for this call. You need to have the lock on SimpleServerRpcConnection.responseWriteLock
        返回:
        true if we proceed the call fully, false otherwise.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • processAllResponses

        private boolean processAllResponses(SimpleServerRpcConnection connection)
                             throws IOException
        Process all the responses for this connection
        返回:
        true if all the calls were processed or that someone else is doing it. false if there * is still some work to do. In this case, we expect the caller to delay us.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • doRespond

        void doRespond(SimpleServerRpcConnection conn,
               RpcResponse resp)
        throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException
